title: Ads
text:
The ads block the rocks with the metal inside and I can’t see without having to mine the whole thing
And most of the time is copper and it’s very invaluable

title: Some reason addicting
text: I found this game in a whim and it is surprisingly addicting. I can play with one hand and the different types of swords you can make are great fun I wish I had more decoration around the game area. And a book with the metals and alloys I can make

title: Looking forward to updates
text: All around pretty good game. Feels kind of base level done. I would love to see new weapons added whether that means multiple weapon racks or more valuable weapons.

title: Not to bad but can be better
text: The game isn’t bad at all. Just some updates such as something to get rid of unwanted stones to make more valuable swords. Probably add more steps like making the hilt, or a grinding wheel to be able to sharpen the swards

title: Great concept
text: Great concept,  addicting at first. If you could make money off of the swords that you can’t put in your shop, or Recycle old stones that would be awesome

title: Hammering problem
text: After a while the blade gets to a point where you aren’t able to hammer it anymore

title: Decent
text: This game is decent. I like the concept the only down side is that if you choose a different sword or hilt to make it doesn’t seem to want to hammer straight. If you can fix that it would be great

title: Don’t do it
text: Adds are mandatory to upgrade any further and some swords just won’t hammer out to where you have to close the app completely and you don’t really know what stones your getting to put in the sword and there’s no way to recycle unwanted stones.

title: No way to progress
text: You are just stuck doing the same thing and it gets really boring any type of upgrade system would be nice or something to you the money we earn on but as of right now I don’t see the fun in this game after about 5-10 min

title: Why?
text: Is there any sort of progression or is this it?

title: No income or saving
text: Data doesn’t save no income from swords

title: Title
text: The swords aren’t giving any income
